item.description:
Hi folks! Let's look for signs of spring as we walk and talk with a group of friendly folks whose mission is the same as our own: get exercise in good company in the great outdoors! This Meetup will take place at Chatfield Hollow State Park, which is a state park located in Killingworth, CT.

$2 DONATION: Please contribute toward group maintenance and webpage fees. Please note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

Meet at the outer parking area at 11:55 or 12:00 and head out at five after.

DIRECTIONS: From I-95: take Exit 63, and follow Route 81 north to Route 80 west. Drive about 1.2 miles west on Route 80 and look for park entrance on your right (it comes up quick). Google map / Directions to park
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Organizer) will meet you in the parking area.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Walk at Chatfield Hollow
